title: February news from balena!
text:
Phew! It’s February already and it’s been a busy start to the year in balena-land. We’ve got a few of our own projects to share with you this month, but of course we have some more stuff shared by the community too -- you guys continue to impress us with your innovative use of the platform.

Last month we gave you an update on our progress with EtcherPro, and since then we’ve posted a few more images over in our forums; have a look here to see the latest progress on our prototypes.

If you’ve got anything you’d like to see featured, get in touch at hello@balena.io, let us know in our forums at https://forums.balena.io, on Twitter @balena_io, on Instagram @balena_io or on Facebook. We always love to see what you’ve been working on!
